channel.title: Noclip command for 667 client?

item.title: Noclip command for 667 client?
item.dc:creator: @Daluge Daluge
item.description:
@Daluge wrote:

How would I implement a clientside noclip command into a 667 client. I tried using a PI noclip command, but it gives me errors during compiling. Hereâ€™s the code I used.

if (string.equalsIgnoreCase("::noclip")) { for (int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for (int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for (int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) { aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; } } } }
